feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [laravel/framework] Laravel environment manipulation via query string
entry.content:
Description

When the register_argc_argv php directive is set to on , and users call any URL with a special crafted query string, they are able to change the environment used by the framework when handling the request.

Resolution

The framework now ignores argv values for environment detection on non-cli SAPIs.

References

  • https://github.com/laravel/framework/security/advisories/GHSA-gv7v-rgg6-548h
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-52301
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gv7v-rgg6-548h

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
A flaw was found in moodle. Insufficient sanitizing of data when performing a restore could result in a cross-site scripting (XSS) risk from malicious backup files.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-43437
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2304266
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=461207
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-81394
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4hjf-6pxr-549h

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle has insufficient capability checks
entry.content:
A flaw was found in moodle. Insufficient capability checks make it possible for users with access to restore glossaries in courses to restore them into the global site glossary.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-43435
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2304263
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=461205
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-64984
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4gq2-x5w4-7hp8

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle's user/power level management inconsistent with suspended users
entry.content:
A flaw was found in moodle. Matrix room membership and power levels are incorrectly applied and revoked for suspended Moodle users.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-43433
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2304261
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=461202
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-81951
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-q99x-mjmh-v8w7

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle's user/power level management inconsistent with suspended users
entry.content:
A flaw was found in moodle. Matrix room membership and power levels are incorrectly applied and revoked for suspended Moodle users.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-43433
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2304261
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=461202
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-81951
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-q99x-mjmh-v8w7

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle authorization headers preserved between "emulated redirects"
entry.content:
A flaw was found in moodle. The cURL wrapper in Moodle strips HTTPAUTH and USERPWD headers during emulated redirects, but retains other original request headers, so HTTP authorization header information could be unintentionally sent in requests to redirect URLs.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-43432
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2304260
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=461200
  • http://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=search&h=HEAD&st=commit&s=MDL-82136
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7wmp-2xmx-g6h8
